Message:
It was not my intention
to be a ruler of any sort.

But, I had no choice other than
to assert my claim to the throne.

To put an end to this long
conflict for the crown,
and return peace to my country—
the Kingdom of Vyde.

As the old stories go,
a mighty weapon was forged by
our forefathers to fell tyrants—
“Executioner.”

I used the sword to
massacre many a brethren,
and ascend the throne.

...Had I fought alone,
I am certain I would have
met my end.

I owe everything to Ophelia,
who stood by my side
the entire time.

She is this kingdom’s
finest royal guard,
and my dear friend
since childhood.

To me, there is no one else
I consider family.

So, I presented Executioner
to her, requesting her to do
the unthinkable.
...I had her promise to kill me.
